title: Breaking Benjamin - Dear Agony [COMPLETE ALBUM]
description: The entire fourth album from Pennsylvania modern-rock band, Breaking Benjamin, Dear Agony, off of Hollywood Records 01. Fade Away - 0:04 02. I Will Not Bow - 3:21 03. Crawl - 6:56 04. Give Me a Sign - 10:55 05. Hopeless - 15:14 06. What Lies Beneath - 18:33 07. Anthem of the Angels - 22:07 08. Lights Out - 26:10 09. Dear Agony - 29:43 10. Into the Nothing - 34:02 11. Without You - 37:46 *I'm not going to repeat myself. Any complaints about the opening will be removed. I'm getting really tired of having to explain the same thing over and over again. ._.
